website_summaries.verdict: A large towel rack that makes your clean towels easily accessible and doubles as an accent piece on your wall.
pros: Can store up to six rolled-up towels
Hangs on the wall for space-saving design
cons: Not ideal for storing wet towels that need drying out

customer_reviews.title: Love my towel rack!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions great! I painted it an antique Nickle to match my bathroom because it was only offered in bronze. I love it and it works great. Great storage that looks nice and it out of the way. May be purchasing another for our 2nd bathroom soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with my towel racks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bracket that allows me to hang my towel rack from my shower wall. Perfect solution. Up and out of the way. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love My Towel Rack
customer_reviews.text: Great towel rack for my small bathroom. Wanted something that would hold a good amount of towels since I have no space to put towels anywhere in my bathroom. This fit the bill perfectly. Made very well and comes with all the hardware to hang it which is very nice. Looks great, gives the bathroom a very nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Gina V

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and sort of classy looking.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a very small condo that has little available storage. It holds regular thick towels great but my large fluffy bath sheet towels are a little more snug but still works. It was easy to mount on wall but i recommend using different anchors than what comes with the rack. I used self drilling drywall anchors by snapskru, #6 x 1-1/4 and it was a total breeze with power screw driver. I love the looks of this as convenient towel rack hung on wall just next to shower and appreciate the storage capacity. And placing colorful towels in it adds a pop of happiness to an otherwise small, dark and Windowless bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a small bathroom knows that free space is almost non-existent, and these have been so great. We bought 2 so we had one for each bathroom, and we were able to get the majority of our towels up on them and looking nice (which means we freed up space in the linen closet)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a towel rack. Pretty heavy duty. It was a little bent upon arrival, but I was able with a little muscle adjust and straighten to my liking. I plan to get another one when we remodel our other bathroom. The towels are pretty tight in each position. Almost too tight. These are just average "Costco" towels. I might take it down and bend them out a bit. Getting the towels in and out will be difficult. My husband also used a little heavier molly for hanging. The ones that came with were ok, but he wanted to beef it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Keane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bw wraps!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this rack in another mommas as and had to ask where she got it because it looked so good. I am honestly happily surprised by the quality. These will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: LEA R CASARES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful in my spare bathroom get so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Really like the way this looks in the pictures but don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the way this looks in the pictures but don't care for how it worked out in our bathroom with the towels. The full size bath towels are held very tightly so it's very hard to pull them out and put them in. The other towel sizes, i.e. hand and washcloths, are swallowed up in the rack. I may decide to move it to another room and use for another purpose. I do like the quality and look of it, just not the functionality for towels in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Booksrmything

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I have very little space in my home and this was the perfect solution. My bathroom has no storage aside from two small affixed cabinets that aren't even large enough to use as toilet paper storage let alone anything larger. The hallway outside the bathroom is more of a walkway than a hallway, so the towel storage had to be contained enough to not stick out but large enough to fit all our towels. This mount was the perfect buy. We are able to fit all our towels on here with no issue. I absolutely recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wine/Towel rack perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all the extra towels. Nice display and easy to install and use. I bought two, one for each bathroom. And they would work great for wine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Star Darling

customer_reviews.title: 10 Minutes to Towel Clarity!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install. Placed the rack against the wall with a level on the top of the rack, marked all the holes with a pencil. Pre-drilled all the holes with a bit slightly smaller than the anchors provided. Tapped the anchors in with a hammer, then put the rack up. Took maybe 10 minutes total. Rolled up the towels, and snapped a pic. This arrived this morning via prime, and was installed immediately. No more towels cluttering up space in our tiny bathroom. So why only 4 stars? Several of the racks were not even with each other. I had to bend 4 of them to get them to line up correctly. Other than that, highly recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Change

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new towel rack! It looks perfect in my bathroom; it's a beautiful piece! The only thing is that I couldn't use the anchors and screws given because our walls rejected them. (We have super thin/cheap walls)Other than that this product is BEAUTIFUL! Took maybe 5 minutes to put up with 2 people. I tried myself but the piece was a little heavy to hold with one hand while trying to screw. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far one of the best decorative piece that I have in my bathroom. I decided to use this as a towel rack. It was a little heavy when trying to mount it to the wall, so make sure you have someone to help you. The company supplied two types of screws. A set for drywall and set for wood. Simply amazing. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shuntina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, the towels fit nicely even the spa towels!
customer_reviews.author: Don R Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions and better molly anchors
customer_reviews.text: Great color, great storage capacity, great functionality; however, no installation instructions were provided. In addition, the plastic molly anchors provided were not sturdy enough for a sound, non-slipping of the wall screws. So, we had to drill new holes in the wall, and use different anchors to avoid screws slipping out of wall. Of course, I wasn’t happy to have to repair the first set of holes and repaint, on my fresh new bathroom remodel!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome. You can get a can of metal spray ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4, but could only find places for 2. They are awesome. You can get a can of metal spray paint and make them the color you want
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kryka

customer_reviews.title: Storage problems? Get it.
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a smaller place and have been struggling to figure out my storage space. This really saved me. I buy the biggest bath towels you can (I think they're called sheet towels?), and rolled up they fit great and stay in place. I can get four of those in here, then use the upper ones for some microfiber hair towels and face cloths, which allows me to keep the "linen closet" for storing other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: The Rack You Deserve
customer_reviews.text: I actually mix and match what this is used for. Sure, It's mounted in the bathroom, but that doesn't mean I can't use it for wine. It makes it super easy to drink in the bathtub. Then when you're done, reach in the same direction for a towel to dry off!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Cookfair

customer_reviews.title: Towel Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Item received on time. Just like the picture...we didn't use the original hardware and used our own for installation. Looks very nice in bathroom for my guest towels and happy with the storage convenience. Only reason I knocked off a star is due to their hardware failure on our first go around with installation.
customer_reviews.author: mily

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap holder
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold baby carriers. For this use, ideally, the top two racks would be the same width as the lower ones, but for it's intended use (towels/wash cloths), it is perfectly suited. It fits SSCs and long wraps snugly. Edges and finish are smooth (no corners or burrs), and the color is a nice, rich bronze. Mounts easily (4 screws provided). The metal gives slightly; so far this is not a problem (and is, in fact, helpful when hanging larger wraps), though I am somewhat nervous that it could cause damage in the future (broken bracket, damage to finish, etc.); I will amend this review if that happens.
customer_reviews.author: TacomaRain

customer_reviews.title: Saved us SO much space... now we can close our door.
customer_reviews.text: Our towels used to sit in a basket on a table behind our door. I mounted this right to the back of our door and with the table gone our bathroom now seems twice as big. Love it. It's easier to get at the towels, there's no longer crap hiding at the bottom of our towel basket and we can keep track of our towels better. Wish I had gotten this YEARS ago.
customer_reviews.author: celt-rock

customer_reviews.title: Wine rack/towel rack
customer_reviews.text: I want so badly to love these and they’re close. I’m using them as towel racks and they work well for that purpose. My primary problem is that one of them is fairly crooked and it’s driving me crazy. We tried to straighten it out but it still looks odd.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I like the towel holder but a number of the rungs ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the towel holder but a number of the rungs were bent and I thought it had 3 different sizes, for bath towels, hand towels & wash cloths, but there are only 2 sizes. The bath towels fit great but the hand towels & wash clothes need at least 3 in each rung to hold them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great towel storage and shows well!
customer_reviews.text: The product's box was torn and really banged up when it was delivered. I was worried that the product would be damaged, but it was not. This is a nice display on any bathroom and great way to store your towels for you or your guests. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful holding towels in my very small bathroom. Installation was a breeze. The seller is thoughtful enough to provide 5 long screws, 5 shorter screws, and 5 drywall anchors. An extra of each!!! I can't recall how many times I have lost a screw or anchor on other projects and had to run to the hardware store! I was worried about it staying screwed in with the towels being pulled off, but it is really strong when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully well for towels.
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain if this would work well as a towel rack, but it has, beautifully. My bathroom has a very clean and uncluttered look, which is what I wanted. We have large towels, but not "bath sheets" which would not work. I did try rolling the towels a few different ways to determine which worked best and looked the best. The rack is sturdy and easy to mount....hardware is included.***just ordered a second, for our son, as he really liked the way it looks, and I'm still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: helen0225

customer_reviews.title: Consider buying your own wall anchors before putting this up
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, it looks great, and holds 4 bath towels and 4 hand towels nicely. My only gripe is with the plastic wall anchors that came with it. They were useless, and I had to run to the hardware store to buy better ones. If not for that, I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby carriers!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this rack to store baby carriers. At present moment it contains one Mei tai, two woven wraps, a gauze wrap, and two gauze swaddle blankets plus bibs hanging from one of the bottom hooks. This is the perfect thing for keeping my carriers up off the floor and attractively displayed! I can even hook the strap of my beco over one of the hooks yo keep it out of the way when not in use. I'm especially in love with how nice this looks with my decor and how it allows me to make my carriers part of my home decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Randall

customer_reviews.title: but the product is great! Wonderful since my bathroom isn't big enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Received a day late, but the product is great! Wonderful since my bathroom isn't big enough for a regular towel rack.
customer_reviews.author: kittyhm

customer_reviews.title: Have 3, buying 2 more! Great for blankets, and SSC's
customer_reviews.text: I actually have 3 of these as I bought 1 set, and ended up needing 2 more. I use mine to store blankets and all 12 of my Baby Carriers. I love this product so much and it comes with a lifetime warranty! I plan on buying 2 more of these as I want some for my bathroom now. Best buy ever. Saves space and it's decorative <3
customer_reviews.author: Mama Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Great towel racks
customer_reviews.text: My daughters both have their own small bathrooms but very little storage. I needed something to hold their towels in order to free up the cabinet space under their sinks. These worked perfectly. Only concern is that the bath towels fit very snugly so I hope my girls don't pull the rack from the wall trying to get their towels. We did use the sheetrock anchors provided in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: sarah7232

customer_reviews.title: Oversize towels fit well
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something which would hold large towels. This does and looks great too. Didn't install on a wall, purchased two over the door hooks and hung over glass shower. I did place small furniture pads where metal would contact the glass. All in all enjoying this towel rack!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described. Very durable. Shipped fast and arrived in prestige condition
customer_reviews.author: Shadenhar

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a towel rack that would hold 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels, and 2 wash cloths..... as pictured. I received a towel rack that holds 4 bath towels and 2 hand towels.... also I liked the scroll design of the towel rack that I ordered, but the one I received was square, no scroll design and was much bigger then the one I ordered.... not happy....
customer_reviews.author: Marcee Watts

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I got another door hanger with lots of hooks that just hanks over the door.. I just hung it from that. Now I have a place to hang clothes and put all my towels.. .if you are in a small apartment this is a must.. Spend a little extra and get this big towel rack.. You won't regret it when you see all of the space in your closet.
customer_reviews.author: yourmothersir

customer_reviews.title: Compact but pretty towel storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my small bathroom! If you roll them tightly, you can fit 4 washcloths on the top spot, 3 hand towels on 2nd from top spot. As you can see, I used 3 for bath towels but the bottom to hang my used towel and bathmat. My only negative comment is that the diagram instructions to drill the holes was way off.
customer_reviews.author: dmc77

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall decor for towels  or wine bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it is used to elegantly display towels in my bathroom However it is fairly heavy to hang from the wall without putting it into a stud and only one side could go into a wall stud because most wall studs are 16 inches apart. Had to use a drywall plug for the other side. Other than that it’s lovely, stylish, and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen clayton

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for towels in our new home and was so excited when it arrived until I realized it was broken. Still holds the towels so i'll fix it myself when I get some glue but nonetheless i'm disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Saves space
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for this item. I did not receive a discount at all. This review is for the towel rack mount. I was worried when I ordered this that it would be too small to fit my towels rolled up. However, it fits several of my towels at the bottom and hand towels at the top. It works really great for us as I only had limited space for the guest bath right above the toilet. I like that it hugs them snugly and looks great while saving space! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: texanatheart

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch, good space saver solution.
customer_reviews.text: The rack arrives on time. Bottom U shaped holder was bent a little but I was able to bend it back somewhat to shape. I'm using for towels in a storage challenged small bath and it works well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: they fit fine there and the doors still close well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of 3 of these wall mounted racks for additional storage of towels and sheets on the back side of closet doors; they fit fine there and the doors still close well. The build quality of these racks is very nice. However, looking at them on line I thought that they would hold more than in real use. Deco Brothers was very prompt in shipping these racks and they were well packaged - no damage. So, if you need extra storage, these cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Came bent
customer_reviews.text: The bottom two holders are bent inward, still do their job but I’m a perfectionist. I actually just hung this on a double towel hook that was already screwed into the door and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MeowMom

customer_reviews.title: Fits wonderfully in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have a very narrow space in my very small bathroom for hanging up towels (or anything else for that matter). This item fits the space perfectly and holds much more than the small bar that was originally there. My bathroom is much tidier now, and I'm much happier.
customer_reviews.author: T. MCCOY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for towel storage in our camper bathroom and couldn't be happier. They look nice and are very well made. This will help us a great deal with saving space!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged, with all mounting hardware in the box, including screws and drywall inserts. Easy to mount with included hole template, which was sort of unnecessary since the holes were accessible from the front. The mounting hardware is finished in the same bronze plating as the unit, so it blends perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a towel holder and am very happy with it. It is taller than I thought it would be, but holds 4 towels and 3 hand towels. I did purchase thinner towels because I liked the loom more than my thicker towels. I've gotten some very nice compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take up some empty space on a wall in my bathroom and also free up some cabinets for other things. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits my large towels perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom storage space is extremely limited. This works perfect to store my bath large towels. I don't know why I did not get it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save Space, Go Vertical!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to display guest towels when needed. My guest bath room is small and counter space is at a premium. This rack gives the room vertical space. Attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Betty krocker

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for storage in a small bathroom and this was perfect. Shipped quickly and came in one piece. Very sturdy and was easy to install. Had all necessary hardware and a few extra pieces. There was a paper with a template for screw placement but that didn't match up. But it was easy enough to place on wall and mark the holes for anchor placement. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Duhritatoo

customer_reviews.title: Worked out perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a piratical and decorative piece, this was both. I have thick towels and this worked very well. Plenty of room for large and small towels, easy to install it comes with both size screws for studs or drywall. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Just right for bathroom without built in storage
customer_reviews.text: In my oddly designed 1969 bathroom there wasn't anywhere to store towels. This wall rack did the trick for bath towels and smaller size as well.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.B

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these! Ordered two, one for each bathroom. I love the look and the ample size.and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Siochan

customer_reviews.title: I really like this towel rack
customer_reviews.text: I really like this towel rack. It's proven to be a great way to store towels with easy access in my bathroom. I think I'll buy another if I see the right color for the guest bathroom. It's heavier then I expected, which is a good thing, as it is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Olson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for in a towel rack!!
customer_reviews.text: This rack solved my towel storage problem! Looks very elegant with rolled towels. It came fully assembled and with the screws to easily attach to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: One ear

customer_reviews.title: I like it but its a tight squeeze for the larger ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but its a tight squeeze for the larger towels. It gets the job done but I wish it was a tad bigger
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: really nice rack for my towels I bought two of them they hold the towels really nice and it is very elegant looking
customer_reviews.author: sharon costello

customer_reviews.title: pleased with the well made towel rack
customer_reviews.text: I have received so many compliments on my towel rack. I placed mine half-way up the wall above my toilet. I have a small bathroom so this draws your eye upward. Compliment it with 72" x 84" shower curtains and it is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Camper Bath Solution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack to hang towels in my camper bathroom. It looks great and solves the small storage problem I was having for towels. Now they are at arms reach! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly as a towel rack!
customer_reviews.text: We were running out of room in our linen closet. This rack saves so much room; we use it for our large bath towels and it looks great in the bathroom. Wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It's held up so well in two different houses and we always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lynn WhackINk

customer_reviews.title: Also works well as a wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a wine rack, and it works precisely the way I wanted in my house. It was easy to install and looks good with the bottles and seems to be very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Isbell

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This track is every bit as nice as it appeared in the pictures. Lightweight enough to hang with anchors since we didn't have a stud to work with, yet sturdy enough to hold the rolled up bath towels I hung in it. It's the perfect way to make the little spot I had in mind functional. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love how this item has solved my towel storage issue in a small bathroom. I thought I might spray paint it but I didn't need to. It's stylish and functional. I showed it to friends and they have been impressed with how useful and beautiful it is
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: As SHOWN, couldn’t imagine it being sturdy enough for wine. I bought mine for towels. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a towel rack and have received so many compliments on it. It looks great in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: bookseller227

customer_reviews.title: Seemed very well made
customer_reviews.text: But Taller than expected. I was hoping to mount over the sink top - but the top storage slots were too high to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Don Day

customer_reviews.title: Somebody's mad
customer_reviews.text: Idk if the guy that boxed my order up was having a bad day or what, but mine was all bent and out of shape. Seems pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: I'm a Girrafe

customer_reviews.title: What a Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: What a space saver. It handles towels and rolls of toilet paper and frees under cabinet storage. Yes it could even be used for wine although I'm not using it in that fashion. The dark bronze appearance completely matched my oil-rubbed bronze features in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Chuqeaux is an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Towel holder.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and decorated for towels or wine. I use it for towels and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery daoust

customer_reviews.title: Color and size are wonderful. -- We used it as a towel rack
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as stated in description. Color and size are wonderful. -- We used it as a towel rack, but I can see how wonderful it would be if it was to be used as a wine rack. it is sturdy, but not bulky. Hardware comes with it, was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Professor35

customer_reviews.title: Its cute and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and convenient. Some of the tines were crooked upon arrival and I had to bend them back to make it look symmetrical. This caused the paint to flake off in one spot, if not for this I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: matthew sitzman

customer_reviews.title: We have oil rubbed bronze finish accessories and this matches perfect. I hung this on one of our walls ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just what our bathroom needed. We have oil rubbed bronze finish accessories and this matches perfect. I hung this on one of our walls with out colorful towels and it is not only functional, but adds a nice splash of color to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kapes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a home project
customer_reviews.text: I bought two wall mount racks to decorate my guest bathrooms. The product is exactly as it is described and very simple to install on the wall. It is sturdy and looks great in both of my bathrooms. I have been complimented by guests and friends for the way my bathrooms are organized and they particularly love the wall mounted towel holders. This is a good product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Wall mounts
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! I used mine as towel racks. I love this idea way more versus the traditional storage cabinets. Would recommend for others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Walker

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's exactly what I wanted for my towel rack. It came and was exactly as it looked in the picture and I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Product was as described and reflected the other ratings. *Only dislike was that the little arms were bent/crooked. But they were easy to straighten out and correct. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Even my husband was happy with how ...
customer_reviews.text: This rack was purchased for my motorhome that has precious little space. The only idea I could come up with was to go vertical. This piece fit perfectly in the bathroom and used space that would otherwise have been empty. I love it! Even my husband was happy with how it looks and how it serves a purpose! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the home
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this not to hold towels, but to hold baby wearing wraps! Works wonderfully, and the various size mounts (they get smaller as they go up) work to hold different length wraps. The metal likely wouldn't stand up to heavy weight, but works great for what we use it for. Very happy with how it looks on our wall.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to hang, all hardware included. It's almost like a wrought iron material and blends well with my oil rubbed bronze hardware. Amazing quality and value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Annedrya

customer_reviews.title: A great Amazon find!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, very easy to hang, comes assembled, good quality construction, and looks nice. Bought one and liked it so much we bought another. Towel storage that looks nice - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: For true bath "sheets" not bath towels the openings are ...
customer_reviews.text: For true bath "sheets" not bath towels the openings are to small. I was able to slightly bend each holder and now the bath sheets fit well =)
customer_reviews.author: Big Zero

customer_reviews.title: Great for towel rack!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to use for towel storage. These work great. Busy household so we put them side by side and it has been a perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Austin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very classy style. Sturdy and well made! Looks perfect with my oil rubbed bronze fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this towel rack. Looks nice and is functional
customer_reviews.author: kiwi909

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Works well for me. Love that they included a paper to get the spacing perfect on the anchoring nails.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much that I bought two more for my niece. They are a compact and decorative way to store towels without a bulky wall cabinet. They look exactly like the photos and work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!! Narrow so you can only attach it to one stud but that made it VERY sturdy. Hung in Bathroom for towels. Concerned that towels might be too big once rolled but PLENTY of room. Nice feature if you need storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rustic look
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice rustic look and holds four large towel and two smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Chelssa Snow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for small space
customer_reviews.text: We have a tiny bathroom that has to work for 4 kids. This towel holder is a lifesaver. We installed it on the back of the bathroom -- so it takes up ZERO space. Holds large fluffy towels well & is easy to "load"
customer_reviews.author: PololvrTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DecoBrothers Deliveries - Solid Towel Hooks!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the photos don't give these towel racks justice - they are well welded, massive enough to take bath sheets in the larger hooks and bath towels in the smaller ones. The mounting hardware is top notch - everything from the anchors to the screws themselves; very, very sturdy, solid gear. Make sure to check your measurements first, it's my only word of caution but it's not enough to drop a star because they are very much worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rack. I placed it in my bathroom to hold towels. It's sturdy/ durable, easy to hang, and comes with necessary screws. Happy about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shanay

customer_reviews.title: A great look
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks great in my bathroom with towels on it!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyBoo

customer_reviews.title: Not for fat towels
customer_reviews.text: This item was very attractive, but unless you have really thin towels, it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this towel rack
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel rack. We redid our bathroom from top to bottom and put this towel rack above the toilet. It is sturdy, well made, and handsome. I absolutely am thrilled with it. It holds several towels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Burge

customer_reviews.title: I like the wall mount but it arrived with one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the wall mount but it arrived with one of the towel metal holders bent. Trying to bend it out. It was in a box, so it must have been packed already bent. Not good quality control.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for towels in our master bedroom and love how they organize the towels and look chic! I also am a babywearing fanatic and love that I can use one of these to store all of my tulas, ring slings, and wraps! I also love the finish on them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Recently received but I'm loving the look of this rack in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution for small bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and looks great! Perfect storage solution for my small, closetless guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: DarleneAD5
